title: Problem-Based Learning-Utilized Graphic Engineering Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic graphic tool usage and understanding of engineering concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Learning Environments Using VR Devices with Access to Learning Materials via Personal Mobile Devices

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world graphic engineering problems through PBL and propose 3D model visualization solutions with 80% accuracy.
Learners can diagnose and correct geometric modeling errors within three attempts in a VR simulation environment.
In team-based problem-solving processes, learners can improve graphic design prototypes to a 90% completion rate by incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
